title: League Client Crashs?
body: So when ever i get into champ select my client will crash at least once a day. Idk if there is any way to fix this or what, but i've lost out on promos because of this, pls help.

replies.body:
Crashes in champion select are widely caused by your client disconnecting from the matchmaking servers. When the crash occurs, it usually means the disconnection was enough to drop off the link between the client and server completely. While we may need to dig deeper into this, I suggest starting your investigation by delving into our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps yielded positive results.
